moves.name: Anchor Shot
moves.effect: The target is trapped and cannot switch out.

moves.name: Autotomize
moves.effect: The user's Dexterity is sharply raised by 2, and its weight is halved.

moves.name: Behemoth Bash
moves.effect: Deals double damage to Dynamaxed Pokémon.

moves.name: Behemoth Blade
moves.effect: Deals double damage to Dynamaxed Pokémon.

moves.name: Bullet Punch
moves.effect: This move has Priority.

moves.name: Corkscrew Crash
moves.effect: Z-Move. Base power depends on the original move.

moves.name: Doom Desire
moves.effect: The attack strikes two turns after it is used.

moves.name: Double Iron Bash
moves.effect: Hits twice. On each hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Flash Cannon
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Insight is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Gear Grind
moves.effect: Hits twice.

moves.name: Gear Up
moves.effect: Raises the Strength and Special of all allied Pokémon with the Plus or Minus ability by 1.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.effect: Damage increases the slower the user is than the target.

moves.name: Heavy Slam
moves.effect: Damage increases the heavier the user is than the target.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.effect: The user raises its Vitality by 2 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.effect: High chance to miss. On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Vitality is lowered by 1.

moves.name: King's Shield
moves.effect: Protects the user from all effects. If hit by a physical move, the attacker's Strength is lowered by 2. Changes Aegislash's form.

moves.name: Make It Rain
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. After use, the user's Special is lowered by 1. Scatters money on the ground.

moves.name: Metal Burst
moves.effect: Deals 1.5 times the damage the user last received.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the user's Strength is raised by 1.

moves.name: Metal Sound
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Insight by 2.

moves.name: Meteor Mash
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the user's Strength is raised by 1.

moves.name: Mirror Shot
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's accuracy is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Shift Gear
moves.effect: Raises the user's Strength by 1 and Dexterity by 2.

moves.name: Smart Strike
moves.effect: This move cannot miss.

moves.name: Steel Beam
moves.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to half of its maximum HP.

moves.name: Steel Roller
moves.effect: Fails if there is no terrain on the field. Removes any active terrain.

moves.name: Steel Wing
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the user's Vitality is raised by 1.

moves.name: Sunsteel Strike
moves.effect: This move ignores the target's Ability.
